title: Problems with my league: fps drops from 200 to 20 continuously in game HELP
body:
Basic after the 7.1 update, I have found this problem when I was playing.

My in-game fps was 200+ when the game started, and then later it dropped and dropped, all the way to 10 or 20, in which I could see almost nothing in the game. Currently I am having Nvidia GTX 1060 6GB and I7-6700HQ, which should be more than enough for LOL. I have been monitoring the CPU and Memory, and they were working just fine. 

I can't play  now, pls helpppp!

replies.body: You might have outdated drivers or bad game files that's causing yoru frames to drop.  Go over the instructions in our [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide to troubleshoot and smooth things out.  Let me know if you have any questions!

Thanks for helping me out! I have updated my graphic card driver several times, so that should not be the cause... Could you tell me how to deal with the bad game files? I would like to try. (I have tried re-downloading the game, and the problem was still there...)

If a re-download didn't resolve it then there may be other factors, which are included in the fps guide.  Generally, bad game files can be fixed through a repair or by downloading our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367).  Be sure to go over each step of that guide to rule out possibilities!
Thanks! I have tried the HRT out now, but there is another problem that its says " Chromium Embedded Framework(CEF) Client Application has stopped working. Then I have to close HRT....
